channel.title: R on Shreyas Ragavan
channel.description: Recent content in R on Shreyas Ragavan

item.title: EdX Course - Data Science with R
item.description: R was developed by statisticians and data analysts as an interactive environment for data analysis. It is not like C or Java. R is free and Open source. Runs on all major platforms. Data objects and Scripts can be shared seamlessly across these platforms. R Console: for interactive commands, similar to the python interpreter. Installing R on Arch Linux : sudo pacman -Sy r Once R is installed, I was able to seamlesly use it in Org-babel, using the source ‘R’.

item.title: On-line Certificate Course: EdX HarvardX PH125.1x: Data Science: R Basics
item.description: Verified Certificate of Achievement The course covered an introduction to using R to extract, manipulate and thus analyse data. It basically lays the foundations to using R in data science. Course Notes and code
